review: I had cough and cold and my sinus was bad. The medicines prescribed by her were good because I recovered quite quickly!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was suffering from chronic cough for the last 2.5 months. I took treatment from a reputed pulmonologist after 1 month of self medication, but my condition was worsening. I decided to go to my native 2 days before my children's scool reopening. All of a sudden it struck me that I can meet an ENT once before leaving. It was a Saturday evening so none of the ENTs nearby were available. Luckily Dr Rakhee at Amar Jyoti nursing home was available. I met her and she calmly listened to my complaints, diagnosed my problem and gave me the right treatment. Within 5 days, there was 90 percentage improvement in my condition. Iam really grateful to Dr Rakhee. She is an excellent doctor and I genuinely recommend her based on my life saving experience
Doctor left without caring about the appointment. She came back 55 mins later and finished my consultation in 2 mins saying there‚Äôs nothing wrong.
reply_text: Since patient was not there only friends came with x ray...I told there is a small pneumonia patch by seeing the x ray ..that takes only 2 minutes....not more than that...

review: Not very happy with the experience. Did not even bother to ask about my condition. Just prescribed some general medication.

HI. I visited this doctor and I am forced to write this as I was provoked by this lady's inappropriate behaviour . I went for a thumb cut , beware , the other lady will not properly give the x-ray report to which I became doubtful. The doc Rakhee suggested to go for a surgeon opinion. I honestly thought it will come under consulting. When I reached the next day , the receptionist told me to pay 500 and I said no I didn't know i have to pay and I was leaving in anger . SHE SHOULD INFORM POLICIES AND OTHER THING RIGHT AWAY. To which the doc Rakee and we spoke in the phone and her words were 'shouting and screaming ' , you have to pay , you have to pay . We have called him for you only. I said why are you forcing me. This is not a way to speak. She didn't let me speak at all. I asked can I atleast meet you as I'm eligible for it. She started screaming again ',that she has come for her son , her son is sick or she was with some patient. I am okay with anything *** *** **** ********** *** *** *** *** ***** ****** **** *** ****** *** **** No matter what , I will never ever vist this ******* ****** *** hospital ever. **** * *** ** ******  Till the end she screamed and the people infront of me just watched me and told me rudely that , don't speak anything just go, when I was trying to explain . The surgeon standing there was polite enough to let me speak and he said go on its okay and I said she was forcing me to pay. I didn't know . I was not using the service in the beginning anyway , they stopped me else I was gone. ** *** ****** * ***** ********** *** ** * **** ***** ***** * **** * **** ******* *** *** ****** ***** ****** *** ********* P.s I will never ever recommend this hospital and the doctor EVER .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She was in a hurry. The call was scheduled at 10. She called around 10.15 after so many chats and reminders. I had Lready shared the report with her, ***** *** *** ******* ***** **** ** *** ************* The consultation fee was 600 rupees  the call was hardly for 8 minutes. When I asked about the diet, she told to check in internet.  I could have checked everything in internet  what's is the point of consulting the doctor then. I was asking something and she disconnected thr call. We treat doctors as God specially during this covid time. But it's so dissapointing.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
My Daughter fell sick due to continuous fever in Bangalore, when she was staying alone in a hostel and was referred to Dr. Raakhee Padival in OPD, She attended her and did the initial diagnostic through blood test and found she was infested with Typhoid fever. 
Immediately, I was called and she explained about the case, rightfully advised to admit for treatment. My daughter was treated well with continuous attention, explaining every treatment and what to expect after every stage.
They attended her independently providing all right treatments, till I reached Bangalore the next day. 
When I reached next day she was better and the treatment continued for one more day and my daughter was released fully fit.

Fee on Practo shows 600/-. She charged us Rs.700/-. Very unprofessional.Kept speaking with the plumber with us in her chamber in the middle of our consultation. Did not care to explain the diagnosis in any detail. Not open to hearing patients problem, instead just want answers to set of defined questions.Not recommended.

I have been going to the doctor since 2005 for every and any health related issue. My family and friends have been to her too on my recommendation. She is the most patient and understanding doctor. Always listens to the issue and treats with the simplest of meds. I would recommend her to anyone blindly.

** *** ****** *** *** **** ** ********* *** ***** ********* *** *** 
2. Wanted me to follow up for the refund of the amount. 
3. Got offended and rude when I was just being direct with my language saying ‚ÄúI shouldn‚Äôt be the one following up‚Äù
reply_text: I never told u that I won‚Äôt refund..I just requested u to remind me..so if u r rude to my request..I think I am not at fault for speaking your language back to u‚Ä¶

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Rakhee's diagnosis of the health issue and the  subsequent advise she administered is really commendable. Added to this is her friendly nature which puts the patient at ease to go to her for any further queries. The doubts are cleared with a lot of patience and understanding. I highly recommend her for any general health issues!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very good improvement within 1 day of medicine course. She had recommended for admission if there is no improvement by next day. Thankgod it started curing soon after the anti biotic medication. She answered all the doubts and was co operative throughout the consultation. I definitely recommend her as one of the best ENT. Thanks.

Payment bill was not given, checked with the hospital staff ther are constantly saying next day.
They took my number and say they will what's app.

Firstly the consultation fees mentioned on Practo was 250 and she charged 350. Just for 2 mins consultation . The mouth ulcer was severe and she just gave some B complex tablets that's it. **** * *** **** ***** ***** ***** * ******* ******** What so special in that..? And what's the point of going to a doctor? It was a big upset. I never recommend this doctor to anyone..
Doctor was busy in her phone during the consultation. Didn‚Äôt explain the problem clearly and just prescribed the medicine.

context: Body Ache,Stomach pain and stomach upset,Food Poisoning,
review: visited Dr Rakhee for my son"s food poisoning and vomiting.. the day despite being a Sunday she was available. friendly approach with a smile ..would recommend her anyday üò¨
I was promptly redirected to a speciality who examined me, conducted a scan and explained what to watch out for regarding my concerns.
Dr was friendly, diagonised the problem quickly, receptive, listened patiently and answered  every questions overall the experience was good

Doctor is very friendly *** ******* **** *********** ************ Happy with the way she explained everything and her approach did resolve the issue. Thanks a lot for keeping it simple and not giving unnecessary long courses or medicines üòä
Dr explained the prognosis and shared prescription online. I changed from a in person consult to online and she was cooperative
She was very helpful, open, ************* and reassuring. My father was reassured. She has a good bedside manner that most doctors lack. She also followed up to see if we were
It was a good experience as this was my first online consultation.Liked the way it is set up.Good one.

I took my mom for the consultation and she was so polite and listening to the issues what we were going through. 
Mam suggestions were pretty good and my mom was convinced with her wordsüôÇ

Thank you mam‚ò∫Ô∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My wife went to the doctor for chest pain and palpitations issue. The doc just saw her reports and half heartedly she okd her just to increase her Thyroid medicines. My wife told the doc that she is awaiting some more reports but she did not listen. She also didn‚Äôt even ask my wife about past medical history about family medical history and all.
Not recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** * **** ****** * *** listens to her patients very patiently and gives medication that help  patient recover quickly. She is very experienced and explains to the patient in a good manner . Staff at Nursing home is very helpful and friendlier.
Can perform ****** diagnosis of the problem. Could've been mor helpful while listening to the patient stories

My dad was having high sugar levels and sodium low count. He was tired and stressed. After getting medical attention from rakhee and prakash, he has recovered well. we were satisfied with the treatment. Friendly staff and Patients are treated well.
Just went there with a minor ailment (since over the counter medicines were of no use) and felt like  doctor was in  some hurry.
She did not treat well as I kept on asking wat I should do for my fever..But she did not had a concern to tell all those as it is her duty. She does not give any suggestions until u ask.
**** ********* *** responsive on chat. Was able to address all issues. Explained steps well, and was available for follow up qs
